text:
{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
    <DESCRIPTION>Dem Publico dienet zur Nachricht, dass des gelehrten und weitberühmten Königlichen Tschudi Land-Ammans in Glarus, welcher sehr hoch angesehene in etliche Folianten geschriebene</DESCRIPTION>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Schweitzer-Chronick</TITLE>
        <DETAILS>Welche wegen ihrer Vortrefflichkeit, bisher nur wenige Bibliotheken mit großem Kosten abgeschrieben, und als ein rares zur Schweizer und benachbarten Länder Geschichten, sehr nützliches Werk aufbehalten worden</DETAILS>
    </BIBL>
    <PURPOSE>zu dem gemeinen Besten per Subscriptiones gedruckt werden solle; worvon das Project bey Hans Jacob Bischoff dem Buchhändler allhier in Basel/ und anderen Orten der Eidgenossenschaft zu finden ist.</PURPOSE>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Das Werk</TITLE>
        <VOLUMES>
            <VOLUME>2 Theile</VOLUME>
        </VOLUMES>
        <FORMAT>
            <TYPE>Folio</TYPE>
            <PAPER>
                <QUALITY>groß</QUALITY>
            </PAPER>
        </FORMAT>
        <PRICING>
            <TERM>
                <DATE>bis den ersten Julii</DATE>
                <PAYMENT>
                    <FIRST_PART>
                        <PAPER>
                            <QUALITY>Papier</QUALITY>
                        </PAPER>
                        <PRICE>4 fl.</PRICE>
                    </FIRST_PART>
                    <SECOND_PART>
                        <PRICE>4 fl.</PRICE>
                    </SECOND_PART>
                    <TOTAL_PRICE>8 fl.</TOTAL_PRICE>
                </PAYMENT>
            </TERM>
            <ALTERNATIVE_PAPER>
                <QUALITY>etwas geringere</QUALITY>
                <PRICE>3 fl.</PRICE>
            </ALTERNATIVE_PAPER>
            <LATE_PENALTY>
                <FIRST_PART>12 fl.</FIRST_PART>
                <SECOND_PART>9 fl.</SECOND_PART>
            </LATE_PENALTY>
            <NOTE>anderst werden sie nicht mehr gegeben werden</NOTE>
        </PRICING>
    </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":14,"explanation":"1. Added XML declaration at the top.
2. Added a <DESCRIPTION> tag to encapsulate the introductory text.
3. Fixed and added proper tags for the text within the first <BIBL> tag, splitting it into <TITLE> and <DETAILS>.
4. Added a <PURPOSE> tag to encapsulate the subscription purpose text.
5. Fixed the second <BIBL> tag structure, splitting into <TITLE>, <VOLUMES>, <FORMAT>, and <PRICING>.
6. Corrected the <VOLUME> tag to include <VOLUMES> as a container.
7. Structured <FORMAT> into <TYPE> and <PAPER> with <QUALITY>.
8. Created a detailed <PRICING> section with nested tags for clarity:
    - <TERM> for the initial payment terms.
    - <PAYMENT> for the payment details of the first part.
    - <FIRST_PART> and <SECOND_PART> for the two parts of the subscription.
    - <TOTAL_PRICE> for the total price.
    - <ALTERNATIVE_PAPER> for the alternative paper quality and price.
    - <LATE_PENALTY> for late payment penalties.
    - <NOTE> for additional notes.
9. Corrected and standardized the text for consistency and readability.
10. Fixed the typo in <PRICE> to <PRICE> (was <PRICE> in the middle of the text).
11. Corrected the special characters (e.g., c to ü, 
7 to ä, etc.).
12. Ensured all tags are properly closed.
13. Improved the logical structure of the document by adding meaningful tags.
14. Fixed the inconsistent use of <FORMAT> tags by splitting them into more specific tags."}

parsed.fixed_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
    <DESCRIPTION>Dem Publico dienet zur Nachricht, dass des gelehrten und weitberühmten Königlichen Tschudi Land-Ammans in Glarus, welcher sehr hoch angesehene in etliche Folianten geschriebene</DESCRIPTION>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Schweitzer-Chronick</TITLE>
        <DETAILS>Welche wegen ihrer Vortrefflichkeit, bisher nur wenige Bibliotheken mit großem Kosten abgeschrieben, und als ein rares zur Schweizer und benachbarten Länder Geschichten, sehr nützliches Werk aufbehalten worden</DETAILS>
    </BIBL>
    <PURPOSE>zu dem gemeinen Besten per Subscriptiones gedruckt werden solle; worvon das Project bey Hans Jacob Bischoff dem Buchhändler allhier in Basel/ und anderen Orten der Eidgenossenschaft zu finden ist.</PURPOSE>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Das Werk</TITLE>
        <VOLUMES>
            <VOLUME>2 Theile</VOLUME>
        </VOLUMES>
        <FORMAT>
            <TYPE>Folio</TYPE>
            <PAPER>
                <QUALITY>groß</QUALITY>
            </PAPER>
        </FORMAT>
        <PRICING>
            <TERM>
                <DATE>bis den ersten Julii</DATE>
                <PAYMENT>
                    <FIRST_PART>
                        <PAPER>
                            <QUALITY>Papier</QUALITY>
                        </PAPER>
                        <PRICE>4 fl.</PRICE>
                    </FIRST_PART>
                    <SECOND_PART>
                        <PRICE>4 fl.</PRICE>
                    </SECOND_PART>
                    <TOTAL_PRICE>8 fl.</TOTAL_PRICE>
                </PAYMENT>
            </TERM>
            <ALTERNATIVE_PAPER>
                <QUALITY>etwas geringere</QUALITY>
                <PRICE>3 fl.</PRICE>
            </ALTERNATIVE_PAPER>
            <LATE_PENALTY>
                <FIRST_PART>12 fl.</FIRST_PART>
                <SECOND_PART>9 fl.</SECOND_PART>
            </LATE_PENALTY>
            <NOTE>anderst werden sie nicht mehr gegeben werden</NOTE>
        </PRICING>
    </BIBL>
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
1. Added XML declaration at the top.
2. Added a <DESCRIPTION> tag to encapsulate the introductory text.
3. Fixed and added proper tags for the text within the first <BIBL> tag, splitting it into <TITLE> and <DETAILS>.
4. Added a <PURPOSE> tag to encapsulate the subscription purpose text.
5. Fixed the second <BIBL> tag structure, splitting into <TITLE>, <VOLUMES>, <FORMAT>, and <PRICING>.
6. Corrected the <VOLUME> tag to include <VOLUMES> as a container.
7. Structured <FORMAT> into <TYPE> and <PAPER> with <QUALITY>.
8. Created a detailed <PRICING> section with nested tags for clarity:
    - <TERM> for the initial payment terms.
    - <PAYMENT> for the payment details of the first part.
    - <FIRST_PART> and <SECOND_PART> for the two parts of the subscription.
    - <TOTAL_PRICE> for the total price.
    - <ALTERNATIVE_PAPER> for the alternative paper quality and price.
    - <LATE_PENALTY> for late payment penalties.
    - <NOTE> for additional notes.
9. Corrected and standardized the text for consistency and readability.
10. Fixed the typo in <PRICE> to <PRICE> (was <PRICE> in the middle of the text).
11. Corrected the special characters (e.g., c to ü, 
7 to ä, etc.).
12. Ensured all tags are properly closed.
13. Improved the logical structure of the document by adding meaningful tags.
14. Fixed the inconsistent use of <FORMAT> tags by splitting them into more specific tags.
